description:
A costume for Mitsuhide Akechi is added.
Enjoy a new and unique costume that gives a fresh look to every battlefield!

■Content
"SAMURAI WARRIORS" Costume - Mitsuhide Akechi

■How to use
Costumes can be changed by selecting "Change Costume" at the "Select Character" screen of "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode".

Note: This is a Limited Time Bonus for free download.
Available until August 9th, 2021.
name: "SAMURAI WARRIORS" Costume - Mitsuhide Akechi
